career.title: Fullstack developer - TechStackApps
career.description: Gained valuable experience working on diverse projects, where I was responsible for implementing solutions based on client needs. I frequently interacted with clients to gather requirements, clarify project goals, and provide updates.

projects.title: 1. Financial Services Web Project
projects.description: Developed a web platform where consultants could manage clients and generate insurance, investment, and other financial products. Primarily focused on front-end development, but also contributed to back-end.
projects.technologies: Vue.js, TypeScript, Java, Spring Boot, MySQL

projects.title: 2. Energy Management Web App
projects.description: Developed a web app for energy consumption monitoring and billing. Processed meter data, allowing our client to generate invoices and reports for their customers to view and download.
projects.technologies: PHP, Laravel, MySQL, InfluxDB, Grafana, Docker, CI/CD

projects.title: 3. IoT Temperature Control System
projects.description: Contributed to an IoT-based home temperature control system, focusing on MQTT device management. Handled device registration and communication between the mobile app and MQTT devices via RabbitMQ.

projects.title: 4. Item Lending Platform
projects.description: Developed the backend for a peer-to-peer lending app, including APIs for the mobile app and an admin dashboard to manage users, products, orders, customer issues, and more.
projects.technologies: PHP, Laravel, Filament, MySQL, Docker, Minio, Pusher, Firebase, Traefik, Node.js, CI/CD

projects.title: 5. Health & Fitness App
projects.description: Developed the backend of a health and fitness mobile application for companies. Supported core API functionalities, data management, and team-based features, allowing managers to oversee activities and manage teams.

quotes.quote: A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.
Do not be wise in your own eyes; fear the Lord and shun evil.
In the world, you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world.
For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
My flesh and my heart may fail, but God is the strength of my heart and my portion forever.
Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
